page.title: 03CHERRY COTTAGE NURSERY
page.content: Cherry Cottage Nursery in Cow Lane mainly grows house plants for delivery to shops. It got its name from a cherry orchard planted in 1900. There are 5 greenhouses taking up 0.75 acres. Five people work there including the owner. The propagating house has electric soil-warming cables and an air heater.Temperatures are kept at 95 degrees Fahrenheit. The next house is for pricking out and is kept at 55 degrees Fahrenheit.There is a sloping bench so that the workers' arms do not get tired. Outside there is about an acre of land for growing pansies and wallflowers. There is a second nursery near the mill.It grows mainly lettuces and tomatoes.The owner works from 4a.m. to 10p.m. during the growing season.
